casebody.data:
Poitinger, Appellant, v. Kip’s, Inc. et al.; Carmel’s Mexican Restaurant, Inc., Appellee.

[Cite as Poitinger v. Kip’s, Inc. (1989), 46 Ohio St. 3d 195.]

(No. 88-1409 — Submitted September 26, 1989 — Decided November 15, 1989.) Anderson, Boyk & McCulley and Charles E. Boyk, for appellant. Robert B. Dixon & Associates and Randall C. Dixon, for appellee.

The cause is reversed and remanded on authority of Gressman v. McClain (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 359, 533 N.E. 2d 732, and Mitseff v. Wheeler (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 112, 526 N.E. 2d 798.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Cacioppo, JJ., concur. Mary Cacioppo, J., of the Ninth Appellate District, sitting for Res-nick, J.
